description: This file is the main entry point for the Spring Boot application 'Notes Backend'. It contains the main method that initializes and runs the application, and is annotated with @SpringBootApplication to indicate its role as the primary source for configuration and startup.

classes.name: NotesbackendApplication
classes.description: Main application class for the Notes Backend Spring Boot application, acting as the entry point.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main method that launches the Spring Boot application.
